character.name: Garrus
desc: A seasoned veteran. His cards create <c=boldPink>midrow</c> objects and add other <c=boldPink>temporary</c> cards to your deck.

VicAuxPower.name: Auxiliary Power
VicAuxPower.desc: At the start of every turn, add {0} <c=card>Auxiliary</c> Cards to your hand.

VicAuxSurge.name: Auxiliary Surge
VicAuxSurge.desc: At the start of every turn, add {0} <c=card>Auxiliary B</c> Cards to your hand.

VicRowControlStatus.name: Row Control
VicRowControlStatus.desc: At the start of every turn, gain {0} <c=midrow>Droneshift</c>.

VicManeuver.name: Maneuver
VicManeuver.descA: Add a <c=card>Glide A</c> to your hand.
VicManeuver.descB: Add a <c=card>Glide B</c> to your draw pile.

VicCalmUnderPressure.name: Calm Under Pressure
VicCalmUnderPressure.descA: Add a <c=card>Plan A</c> to your hand.
VicCalmUnderPressure.descB: Add a <c=card>Plan B</c> to your draw pile.

VicCrisisManagement.name: Crisis Management
VicCrisisManagement.desc: Add a <c=card>Lockdown</c> to your draw pile.
VicCrisisManagement.descA: Add a <c=card>Lockdown A</c> to your draw pile.
VicCrisisManagement.descB: Add a <c=card>Lockdown</c> to your discard pile.

VicBlockade.name: Blockade
VicBlockade.descA: Add 3 <c=card>Trap Charges</c> to your hand and gain 2 <c=status>droneshift</c>.
VicBlockade.descB: Add 3 <c=card>Trap Charges</c> to your hand and 2 to your discard pile.

VicSiphon.name: Siphon Power
VicSiphon.desc: Exhaust a card in hand. Gain 1 <c=status>Auxiliary A</c> to hand.
VicSiphon.descA: Exhaust a card in hand. Gain 1 <c=status>Auxiliary A</c> to hand.
VicSiphon.descB: Exhaust a card in draw or discard pile. Gain 1 <c=status>Auxiliary A</c> to hand.

VicPassiveThrusters.name: Passive Thrusters
VicPassiveThrusters.desc: Add 1 <c=card>Drift</c> to your draw and discard pile.
VicPassiveThrusters.descA: Add 1 <c=card>Drift A</c> to your hand and draw pile.
VicPassiveThrusters.descB: Add 3 <c=card>Drifts</c> to your draw pile and 1 <c=card>Fumes</c> to your discard pile.

VicRecalibrate.name: Recalibrate
VicRecalibrate.desc: Add a <c=card>Thanix Cannon A</c> to your draw pile.
VicRecalibrate.descA: Add 2 <c=card>Thanix Cannon Bs</c> to your draw pile.

VicCalibrate.name: Calibrate
VicCalibrate.desc: Add a <c=card>Thanix Cannon</c> to your discard pile.
VicCalibrate.descA: Add a <c=card>Thanix Cannon</c> to your draw pile.
VicCalibrate.descB: Add a <c=card>Recalibrate</c> to your discard pile.

VicRemember.name: Remember
VicRemember.desc: Choose a <c=status>temporary</c> card in your deck. It becomes permanent.
VicRemember.descA: Choose 2 cards in your deck. They gain <c=status>Retain</c> permanently.
VicRemember.descB: Choose a card with <c=status>exhaust</c> in your deck. It no longer exhausts.

VicCatEXECard.name: Garrus.EXE
VicCatEXECard.desc: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=C8C8C8>Garrus</c> cards to your hand.
VicCatEXECard.descA: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=C8C8C8>Garrus</c> cards to your hand.
VicCatEXECard.descB: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=C8C8C8>Garrus</c> cards to your hand.

VicRadioSystem.name: Spare Satellite
VicRadioSystem.desc: Start each combat with a <c=status>Bubbled</c> <c=midrow>Signal Amplifier</c> near your ship.

VicRegenExhaust.name: Engine Accelerator
VicRegenExhaust.desc: At the start of combat, add a <c=card>Drift A</c> to your hand.

VicOverclockedMissileBay.name: Overclocked Missile Bay
VicOverclockedMissileBay.desc: Gain 1 extra Energy every turn. Every other turn, deploy a <c=midrow>Seeker</c> aimed at yourself.

VicLevelheaded.name: Temporary Booster
VicLevelheaded.desc: The first 2 times you play a <c=status>Temporary</c> card each turn, draw 1 card.

Normal.name: Kinetic Barrier
Normal.description: A highly reflective field of energy. It's <c=boldPink>Indesctructible</c>. Attacking it will damage its attacker for <c=damage>1</c>.

Normal.name: Engine Booster
Normal.description: Beams <c=status>1 EVADE</c> at its target once per turn.

Normal.name: Torpedo
Normal.description: This missile is going to deal <c=damage>2</c> DMG and apply <c=damage>1</c> <c=status>ENGINE LOCK</c>.

Normal.name: Small Space Mine
Normal.description: Destroying it will damage it's destroyer for <c=damage>1</c>.

Normal.name: Signal Amplifier
Normal.description: Beams <c=status>1 DRAW NEXT TURN</c> at its target once per turn.
